climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: GOOD FOR BABIES: With 99% water and organic aloe vera our soft and gentle wipes are EWG Verified and Allergy UK certified and made without fragrance, alcohol, parabens or chlorine. They’re hypoallergenic and PH balanced so perfect for newborn, toddler, sensitive and eczema-prone skin.

GOOD FOR THE PLANET: Sustainably made in the UK to the highest standards. Pura’s wipes are made from biodegradable plant fibres from FSC certified sustainable sources and are 100% plastic-free, certified Vegan and cruelty-free. We use a soft resealable lid to minimise our plastic content and keep wipes fresh. Our packaging is recyclable.

TOUGH BUT GENTLE: Larger than your typical wipes and made with just the right amount of moisture, our wipes are great on bottoms, hands and faces and really clean up when it comes to the biggest of messes. Gentle on skin and the planet, tough on everything else.
TRUSTED BY PARENTS: Made in the UK to the highest standards, Pura wipes have won multiple awards, voted for by real parents.
USING BUSINESS FOR GOOD: Pura is a certified B-Corp and a Carbon Neutral business.
body.description: Pura has created a wipe that can safely clean up big messes without making one for the planet. Soft and strong, our 100% plastic-free wipes contain 99% water and aloe vera and are made from certified sustainably sourced biodegradable plant-fibers. Fragrance-free, EWG Verified and Allergy UK certified, they’re kind to babies and their world. Meet the Pura family Pura didn’t start in a boardroom. It was born in the British home of Guy and Abi Fennell. Created by parents, for parents, Pura was founded to make clean, safe and planet-friendly products affordable for all. Pura is a Carbon Neutral business and a certified B-Corp.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Good for babies! With 99% water and organic aloe vera our soft and gentle wipes are EWG Verified and Allergy UK certified and made without fragrance, alcohol, parabens or chlorine. They’re hypoallergenic and PH balanced so perfect for newborn, toddler, sensitive and eczema-prone skin.

Good for the planet! Sustainably made in the UK to the highest standards. Pura’s wipes are made from plant fibres from FSC certified sustainable sources and are 100% plastic-free, certified Vegan and cruelty-free. We use a soft resealable lid to minimise our plastic content and keep wipes fresh. Our packaging is recyclable.

Good for piggy banks We believe that buying safe, premium quality, sustainable products shouldn’t cost the earth. That’s why we made Pura affordable. No more trade-offs between doing what’s right for your baby or right for our planet. Bring on the change!

Parents love us! Made in the UK to the highest standards, Pura wipes have won multiple awards, voted for by real parents. Pura is a certified B-Corp and a Carbon Neutral business. We put people and planet before profits!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong and thick
reviews.reviewText: Not thin and they dont smell like soap or alcohol. But still are affordable. Skin is left clean and doesn't have any weird residue left behind. Good quality and price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new go to wipes!
reviews.reviewText: I mainly use these for my dog who wears diapers. It is not heavily fragrance and doesn't irritate my dog's sensitive skin when I clean him up. But for really big messes (poop) I can't rely on the wipes. So I have to give him a bath. I never flush wipes of any kind down the toilet. Not good for the drain. I also leave a pack in the bathroom in case you need something more gentle than toilet paper. These wipes are not really juicy which means no drying time needed. I keep my package in a ziploc bag to prevent the wipes from drying out. I would buy these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will continue to purchase because they are EWG verified so I can be at peace knowing I’m not applying toxic cancer causing chemicals on my baby. However, the wipes are annoying to get out and sometimes stacks of wipes come out when I am only trying to grab 1. They stick too tightly to each other. I bought the pack of 3 at first and those were kind of dry but the larger 12 pack was perfect amount of moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The smell is disgusting!
reviews.reviewText: Not satisfied. They are small, not wet enough and smell unpleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As much as I appreciate this company's committment to the planet....this is a terrible product! You can't pull out 1 wipe without a clump of 6 coming out of the tiny dispenser!!! You have to pull, pull, pull and by that time, your baby wipe is a foot long!! Then, you have to try to shove that wad back into the tiny opening and that flimsy closure falls off of the package!! Plus, there's a very odd scent.....and they're too thin...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean continuous wipe
reviews.reviewText: These are our new go to wipe. We had started using Honest which are great but the price tag isn’t. We switched around and found that most “sensitive” wipes made our baby’s butt break out in rash. Water wipes agreed with his skin the best. However they don’t continuously feed, which drove me nuts especially when trying to use a wipe warmer in winter. After a long search I found Pura and tried a single pack out before going for the whole box. They’re very comparable to water wipes and are made of the same material (which is what I think was the biggest issue for my baby rather than the ingredients of the wipe solution itself) - but Pura has a continuous feed so they can work in a wipe warmer! They’re maybe a little drier than other wipes but I simply add water to the pack every so often and they’ve been great. I appreciate that there EWG verified and have a reasonable price tag. The picture is of Pura, water wipes, and Honest for a helpful visual comparison of size and texture (Pura in center). My only complaint is that the packaging leaves some to be desired but you can always use a wipe warmer or dispenser to solve that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I been through alot of wipes and this definitely are the better kind not only for your baby but I use these myself. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Scent is a little weird but nothing too noticeable
